rent Grinty was a commoner from the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Grent was a male gold dwarf with a clean-shaven face, pale skin, and blue eyes. He wore a simple commoners duster and a large hat.
In the , the city of Baldurs Gate was threatened by the encroaching army of the Cult of the Absolute. The crisis flooded the city with refugees, elevating tensions among its citizens and allowing a new power to take rulership of the cityâ€”Lord Gortash. Grent Grinty eagerly consumed the new lords propaganda from the curbside preachers and from the pages of the Baldurs Mouth Gazette. Augur Harxkellan was a Gortash loyalist whose words attracted a crowd of gawkers in the Lower City. Grent Grinty was among the loyalists in the crowd, calling Baldurs Gate Lord Gortashs city.
